name: Love Liar: secret romance
description:
If I could get a revenge on my ex-boyfriend,
I would sell my soul to the devil!
A magic potion of love given by the devil...
But it worked on a wrong person!

One of the four people must have drank the potion.
BUT WHO?!
Somebody must be telling a love lie,
Beginning of dangerous, but steamy romance!

Discover the real truth buried under the romantic lies!

—--------------------------------------------------

Behind the scenes of the entertainment industry,
There goes a thriller-romance!

Four characters who fall in love with you,
Is this the devil’s temptation or true love?
The love depends on your choices!

Love began in doubt!
And the thriller begins with love!
Check out your choices in Love Liar!

Every episode leads to a different ending of love,
You could be kissing another, or in the middle of a romantic scheme!

Pre-register Love Liar and get special rewards!
